title: Content Strategist & Researcher
description:
About This Role



This is not a traditional social media manager position. This role is a strategic thought partner who takes full ownership of content research, scripting, trend analysis, and content calendar management. You will work closely with AI tools like Claude, stay ahead of platform trends, and ensure that every piece of content has a clear strategy and revenue-generating intent behind it.



Keenya handles all TikTok and Instagram content creation, editing, and engagement directly. Your role is to make sure she always has what she needs to show up powerfully and that all other platforms are running strategically and consistently.



Core Responsibilities



Content Research & Trend Awareness

Monitor trending content, viral videos, and emerging conversations across TikTok, Instagram,
, LinkedIn, and YouTube daily

Identify viral content that Keenya can recreate or react to — bring fully formed ideas, not just links

Stay current on what content formats are performing best on each platform and bring that knowledge proactively to the team

Research competitors, industry leaders, and trending topics relevant to Keenya's brand and audience



Scripting & Content Development

Collaborate with Keenya and Claude to develop compelling video scripts that align with her brand voice

Write hooks, talking points, and full scripts for educational, promotional, and engagement-driven content

Ensure all scripts are built around a clear call to action and revenue intent

Develop carousel content for
, LinkedIn, and other platforms — fully designed and ready to schedule



Content Calendar Management

Build and manage a detailed monthly content calendar across all platforms

Ensure captions are fully formatted, spaced, and ready to copy and paste — no additional formatting required from Keenya

Plan content strategically around launches, challenges, promotions, and seasonal 
nts

Manage scheduling for
, LinkedIn, and YouTube using AI and scheduling tools

Platform Management 
, LinkedIn, YouTube)



Create, schedule, and manage content on
, LinkedIn, and YouTube

Engage with comments and community on
 and 
 consistently

Leverage AI tools to automate and streamline posting workflows across platforms

Monitor analytics and report on what is and is not working — with recommended adjustments



Performance Analysis & Strategy

Regularly analyze content performance across all platforms and bring that data to Keenya with clear takeaways

Proactively identify what is underperforming and recommend changes — do not wait to be asked

Always be thinking about how content connects to revenue and program promotion

Ensure the business is consistently selling across all content — membership, challenges, VIP Days, and coaching



What This Role Is NOT

This is not a role where you wait to be told what to do — you bring ideas, strategy, and solutions

This is not a task-completion role — you own outcomes, not just actions

You will not be managing TikTok or Instagram — Keenya handles those directly

You should never need to be reminded to format captions, analyze content, or evaluate performance



The Standard We Are Holding

Keenya should be able to focus on creating and delivering content knowing the strategy, research, and backend execution are handled. If Keenya is constantly catching things that should have been caught, that is a performance issue. The expectation is that you are one step ahead — always.



This role requires someone who is deeply invested in the growth of this brand and the revenue it generates. You should care about the results as much as Keenya does.



Tools You Will Use

Claude (AI) — for scripting, research, and content development

Social media scheduling tools — for
, LinkedIn, YouTube

Canva — for carousel and graphic creation

Analytics dashboards — TikTok, Instagram,
, LinkedIn, YouTube

Google Drive / project management tools for content calendar and team communication

title: Remote Service Representative
description:
Please Read the Whole Job Description Before Applying.



At Meadow, we’re reimagining end-of-life care - a $23B industry untouched by modern software or service thinking. In under a year, we became the largest cremation provider in Los Angeles, with 90+ NPS and hundreds of families served monthly. Now we’re scaling across the U.S.  and hiring globally.



We believe great people live everywhere. Our team works across continents and time zones, grounded by shared values: high standards, deep empathy, and a drive to do work that matters.



Why join:

- Remote-first, global team: work from anywhere, be trusted to deliver

- Fair, transparent compensation: competitive pay, benchmarked globally.

- High expectations, high support: we invest in training and growth

- Respect and humanity: no burnout culture, no hero worship

- Real-world impact: your work supports families when it matters most.





About the Role:



We’re hiring Service Representatives to support families from the 
nt a loved one enters our care through the final steps of the cremation process. You’ll play a critical role in ensuring every case is handled with accuracy, compassion, and attention to detail.



In this role, you’ll own key parts of the journey - coordinating transportation, managing documentation, and ensuring ashes are returned safely. You’ll work directly with families and external partners to provide clarity, build trust, and make sure nothing is missed.



This position is ideal for someone who is empathetic, organized, and comfortable in a fast-moving startup environment. We’re in active build mode, and this role offers meaningful growth for someone who is proactive, collaborative, and motivated to support others during an important 
nt in their lives.



What You’ll Do:

- Respond to inbound calls, texts, and
s from families with empathy, clarity, and professionalism.

- Build trust quickly and maintain rapport as you walk families through each step of the process.

- Own and execute key stages of the customer journey, such as dispatching transportation, managing paperwork, scheduling cremation, or coordinating ashes return.

- Collaborate with internal teams and external partners to move cases forward without delay.

- Keep systems up to date, document clearly, and flag any issues before they become blockers.

- Anticipate downstream impacts and work proactively to ensure smooth handoffs between teams.

- Work efficiently across multiple tools, including HubSpot, Aircall, Slack, GSuite, and our internal case management system.



Requirements & Qualifications:

- 2+ years of experience in customer-facing, operations, or hospitality roles - especially in environments where empathy and execution were equally important.

- Clear, calm communicator who builds trust quickly, whether over the phone,
, or text.

- Strong multitasker - able to move quickly while maintaining accuracy and attention to detail.

- Accountable and proactive: you take ownership, close the loop, and surface issues early.

- Energized by our mission and excited about the opportunity to help shape something new in a category that truly needs it.



Details:

- Remote, full-time

- Compensation: $5-$7.80/hr USD

- Tools: HubSpot (CRM), Aircall (phone), Slack, and our case management system



- Shift: Full-time (8 hours, consistent schedule)

- Days: 

- Tuesday - Saturday (preferred)

- Thursday-Monday (preferred)

- Friday-Tuesday (preferred)

- Monday–Friday (may be considered)



Hours: 

- 8 a.m. - 4 pm PT

- 9 a.m. -5 pm PT

- 11 a.m. - 7 pm PT



Why Join Us:

- Fully remote: Work from anywhere

- Benefits: PTO, 10 Paid Holidays, Paid Training

- Global collaboration: Work with teammates around the world.

- Purpose-driven work: Make a real difference during one of life’s most meaningful transitions

- Supportive, growth-minded team: Bring your drive and eagerness to learn; we’ll support you every step of the way

- Team & Culture: Learn from experienced leaders and work closely with a founding team that values respect, collaboration, and building a healthy culture alongside a successful business.





Apply here: https://jobs.ashbyhq.com/meadowmemorials/ad2b8f4e-b9f5-42b4-92fa-6957d4b17d7b?utm_source=onlinejobsph

title: Creative Strategist – Meta Ads (DTC Performance)
description:
Type: Full-time or Part-time (contract-to-hire OK)



Works with: Founder, Media Buyer, Video Editor, Designer



Primary channels: Meta 
/Instagram) + landing page / advertorial funnel



What you’ll own

- You’ll own end-to-end creative strategy for paid social: customer research ? messaging angles ? creative briefs ? AI statics production ? iteration based on performance.



Responsibilities



Market + customer research

- Research competitors, offers, funnels, and creative patterns

- Build customer avatar docs (pain points, desired outcomes, objections, language)

- Extract “winning hooks” and angles from ads, reviews, Reddit, comments, etc.



Creative ideation + direction

- Generate weekly/monthly creative roadmap (themes, angles, concepts)

- Write clear briefs for static + video (hook, structure, scenes, b-roll, overlays, CTA)

- Develop testing matrices (angle x hook x format x offer)



Copywriting

- Draft / improve landing page copy, advertorial copy, and quiz copy

- Write short-form ad copy (primary text, headlines, descriptions) and script outlines



Creative production (AI statics)

- Generate static concepts using AI tools (Midjourney / Nano Banana / OpenAI image, etc.)

- Ensure brand consistency (palette, font style, layout discipline)

- Deliver ready-to-launch assets to the editor/designer



Collaboration

- Work daily/weekly with the video editor and designer to execute briefs fast

- Provide clear feedback based on performance and brand guidelines



Performance iteration

- Review results (thumbstop/CTR/CPC/CPA/CVR) and propose next tests

- Kill/scale creative based on data and learning, not opinions





What “good” looks like in 30 days

- You deliver a clear creative testing plan and run weekly cycles

- You ship consistent briefs and assets without hand-holding

- Creative velocity increases (more variants, better structure, faster iteration)



Requirements

- Proven performance creative experience for DTC (Meta is a must)

- Strong copy instincts (hooks, objections, offers, landing pages)

- Ability to produce AI statics (or willingness to learn fast)

- Organized: can run creative testing like a system

- Comfortable working async with clear deliverables



Nice to have

- Experience with quiz funnels + advertorial funnels

- Direct-response editing instincts (UGC pacing, pattern interrupts)

- Understanding of compliance in sensitive categories (if applicable)



Deliverables you’ll produce

- Weekly creative plan + angle library

- 10–30 static variants/week (depending on scope)

- 5–15 video briefs/week

- Landing page + advertorial + quiz copy drafts/iterations

title: Intake Admin
description:
Job Title: Intake Admin (Overseas Hire) 

Location: Remote

Type: Independent Contractor (Full-time)

Hire Type: Replacement



About Full Service Pros

Full Service Pros (FSP) is a U.S.-based company supporting restoration and rebuild operations through effective back-office, HR, and client intake services. We are currently seeking a highly organized and client-focused Intake Coordinating Specialist to join our growing intake team. This position is remote and ideal for an independent overseas professional with strong communication and coordination skills.



Working Hours

9:00 AM – 5:00 PM EST, Monday to Friday

Full-time commitment required.



Technical Requirements

• Minimum 2 years of experience in client intake, case coordination, or administrative support (preferably in restoration, insurance, or service industries).

• Strong proficiency in CRM systems, Google Workspace, and Microsoft Office.

• Demonstrated ability to manage sensitive client information with confidentiality.

• Excellent organizational and multitasking skills.



Basic Skills & Attributes

• Strong verbal and written communication skills.

• Professional, reliable, and detail-oriented.

• Ability to work independently with minimal supervision.

• Highly organized with strong follow-up discipline.

• Client service–oriented with problem-solving abilities.



Key Duties & Responsibilities

• Act as the first point of contact for new and prospective clients, providing a professional and welcoming experience.

• Collect and validate client intake information, ensuring accuracy and completeness of documentation.

• Coordinate schedules and appointments with internal teams, ensuring seamless handovers to operations.

• Maintain and update the intake database, ensuring records are accurate and confidential.

• Follow up with clients for confirmation, updates, or additional documentation as needed.

• Escalate urgent or complex cases to the Intake Manager for resolution.

• Generate intake status reports and provide insights for process improvements.

• Support the Intake Manager in streamlining workflows and achieving departmental KPIs.



Non-Negotiables

• Must have prior experience in intake coordination, case management, or client support.

• Ability to commit to U.S. business hours consistently.

• Independent professional (not affiliated with an agency or firm).



Compensation

• Compensation discussions will be handled in detail during the interview.



Application Instructions

Interested applicants are invited to submit the following documents:

• An up-to-date CV or résumé

• A short cover letter highlighting relevant intake/coordinator experience.

• Professional references (if available).



Only shortlisted candidates will be contacted for the next stage of the selection process. We appreciate your interest in joining Full Service Pros.

title: Outbound phone sales
description:
Earn $100 Per Signup | High-Volume Outreach | 100% Remote



We are seeking a high-energy Cold Caller to join our growth team. This is a targeted outreach role where you will be the "first impression" for business owners in our industry. We provide the software, the community, and the training—you provide the hustle.



The Schedule:

Success in cold calling requires hitting the phones when business owners are at their desks. We focus our energy on these high-conversion windows:



Days: Monday – Friday

Calling Hours: 9:00 AM EST – 3:30 PM EST



The Mission:

You will log into our professional dialer and work through a highly specific industry list. Your goal is to break the ice and schedule a phone meeting for a demo of our $297/month marketing suite.



High Payout: $100 flat commission for every first-month signup (a 33% commission rate).



The "Co-Pilot" System: Our Sales Manager will lead the first few meetings you book, helping you close the deals while you learn the ropes.



Targeted Lists: No "random" residential calls. You are calling businesses that actually need our specific marketing tools and classes.



What We’re Looking For:

Resilience: You view a "No" as a necessary step toward a "Yes."

Reliability: You are ready to dial during the 9:00 AM – 3:30 PM EST window.

Clarity: You have a professional home office setup and a clear, confident speaking voice.



How to Apply:

To be considered for this position, please submit a brief summary of your outbound calling experience. Additionally, please include a voice recording of yourself reading the 10-second script provided below. We are looking for candidates who can demonstrate a professional and engaging phone presence.



Voice Audition Script:

"Hi, this is [Your Name]. I’m calling because we’ve been helping other owners in the [Industry Name] space automate their marketing this year. I know I caught you in the middle of your day, but do you have 30 seconds to see if our new software and community could be a fit for you?"

title: Transaction Coordinator (Wholesale Real Estate) – Remote (Part-Time, Growth Opportunity)
description:
RJD Acquisitions Group is a fast-growing real estate acquisitions company focused on wholesale and creative deal structures (assignments, novations, etc.). We are actively scaling and currently have multiple deals under contract with more coming weekly.



We are looking for a high-level Transaction Coordinator who can take ownership of our deals and help ensure smooth, fast closings.



Role Overview:



You will be responsible for managing deals from contract to close. This is not an assistant role — we are looking for someone who can own the process, communicate proactively, and keep all parties aligned.



Responsibilities:



Open escrow with title companies and manage files from start to finish



Communicate with sellers, buyers, and title companies regularly



Send contracts, addendums, and ensure all documents are signed properly



Track timelines, contingencies, and closing dates



Follow up with title on liens, payoffs, and any issues



Coordinate with buyers after assignment (EMD, walkthroughs, closing readiness)



Provide daily/weekly updates on deal status



Identify potential issues early and help solve them



Requirements:



Experience as a Transaction Coordinator in wholesale real estate (REQUIRED)



Strong understanding of assignments, double closes, and/or novations



Excellent communication and follow-up skills



Highly organized and detail-oriented



Ability to manage multiple deals at once



Proactive mindset — you don’t wait to be told what to do



Compensation:



 monthly rate ($600–$800 depending on experience)



Opportunity for long-term role as we scale



What We’re Looking For:



We are not looking for a basic VA. We want someone who:



Takes ownership of deals



Keeps things moving without constant oversight



Communicates clearly and consistently



Understands urgency in real estate transactions



To Apply:



Please include:



Your experience with wholesale real estate transactions



Number of deals you’ve coordinated



Description of your process from contract to closing



Any tools/CRM systems you’ve used



Availability (hours/time zone)



Final Note:



We move fast and expect the same. If you are proactive, experienced, and ready to grow with a scaling company, we want to work with you.



— RJD Acquisitions Group LLC

title: Expert Cosmetic Label Designer – High One-Time Payment
description:
We are an e-commerce haircare brand looking for an experienced designer to create a premium label design for our haircare product tubes.



Responsibilities:



Creating a high-quality, brand-aligned cosmetic label design

Preparing print-ready files (correct dimensions, bleed, color profile)

Implementing feedback quickly

Delivering the final design within 3–4 days



Requirements:



Proven experience in cosmetic/beauty label design

Strong portfolio with relevant projects

High attention to detail and premium design sense

Ability to work fast and meet tight deadlines



Compensation:



High one-time payment (based on experience and quality)

Potential for future projects



If you believe you are a good fit, please send us your portfolio with relevant work.



If we are interested, we will contact you to schedule a short Zoom call.

title: Amazon Specialist - Part Time
description:
Join Our Team as a Part-Time Amazon Specialist 



Job Type: Part-Time | Hours: During CST



Are you an Amazon wizard who loves optimizing listings, driving sales, and mastering marketplaces? We’re looking for a proactive, detail-oriented Amazon Specialist to take our store to the next level. This is a part-time, remote role perfect for someone who thrives on results and wants to grow with a dynamic company.



What You’ll Do:



- Manage and optimize our Amazon seller account (FBA/FBM) – listings, pricing, inventory, and more to increase sales

- Craft SEO-friendly titles, descriptions, and keywords to boost product visibility.

- Monitor account health, metrics, and customer feedback.

- Conduct market research and competitor analysis to spot opportunities.

- Run Amazon advertising campaigns (PPC, Sponsored Products) and analyze results.

- Collaborate with the team to ensure smooth fulfillment and operations.



What We’re Looking For:



- Proven experience managing Amazon seller accounts.

- Solid understanding of listing optimization, SEO, and Amazon PPC campaigns.

- Familiarity with Amazon Seller Central tools and policies.

- Highly organized, detail-oriented, and able to work independently.

- Comfortable with Excel/Google Sheets and inventory management tools.

- Proactive, problem-solver, and adaptable to changing priorities.

- Reliable internet connection and a functional home office setup.

- Strong English communication skills.



Qualifications:



- Experience with multiple Amazon marketplaces (US, Canada, UK, etc.).

- Knowledge of Amazon advertising campaigns and analytics tools.

- Previous e-commerce experience.

- Bachelor’s degree in Marketing, Business Administration, or related field.



How to Apply:

Send us:

1. Your updated resume

2. A short video introduction (max 2 minutes) starting with:

    "Hi, I’m your awesome Amazon Specialist!”

3. A portfolio outlining your relevant experience, including:

    - Examples of your previous work

    - Any relevant certifications or trainings



Important: Applications missing any of the above will not be considered. Only shortlisted candidates will be contacted.

title: Cold Caller & Lead Generation Specialist
description:
We are seeking a skilled Cold Caller & Lead Generation Specialist with extensive knowledge of the NYC Real Estate market. Responsibilities include cold reach outs, probates, farming landlords for rentals, expired listings, and developers. You will work closely with our assistant to organize lead calls and appointments. This is a part-time or full-time position, and we are looking to hire as soon as possible.

Must have own dialer or CRM

Conduct cold calls to generate leads

Organize and set lead calls and appointments

Engage with probates, landlords, and developers

Utilize knowledge of NYC real estate market

Collaborate with assistant for lead management

title: E-commerce Customer Service
description:
We are a e-commerce company looking for a reliable and detail-oriented Customer Support Representative to join our team part-time for a long-term position. You will be responsible for responding to customer
s and messages, tracking orders, processing refunds or replacements, and ensuring an excellent customer experience. You will work with clear SOPs and receive detailed training so you understand exactly what is expected. We are looking for someone with strong written English communication skills, a professional writing style, a positive attitude, attention to detail, and the ability to follow instructions carefully. Experience with Shopify or helpdesk tools such as Gorgias or Zendesk is a plus. You must have a stable internet connection and be available for full-time work. To apply, please describe your previous work experience, your available working hours, and start your application with the word “COCONUT” so we know you read everything.

title: TOP-TIER VIDEO EDITOR (Meta / YouTube / Shorts / Ads)
description:
We are looking for a high-level, professional video editor who understands marketing psychology — not just cutting clips.



If you only know how to trim videos and add captions, this is not for you.



We want someone who can:

• Hook attention in the first 3 seconds

• Edit for retention

• Understand sales flow

• Turn raw footage into money



???? What You’ll Be Editing



 & Instagram Ads



YouTube Shorts / Reels



Long-form YouTube videos



VSLs (Video Sales Letters)



Testimonial videos



UGC-style ad creatives



Short documentary-style brand pieces



???? You MUST Have:



? Proven experience editing performance marketing ads

? Strong understanding of pacing, hooks, and retention

? Text animations & subtitles

Thinks like a marketer

title: eCommerce Coordinator
description:
HOW TO APPLY

If this role feels like the perfect fit and you meet the qualifications, we invite you to learn more about our team in the Philippines and submit your application here: 
/appzq4iqeIREQRVyo/pagS4ltOHDs97kQf9/form



Note: Only applications submitted through the link above will be considered.



---

Mission: To keep our eCommerce engine running smoothly by coordinating product launches, uploads, and site content with high precision and strong follow-through—so our storefronts stay accurate, on-brand, and on schedule.



Key Outcomes



- Monitor and manage all eCommerce-related tasks end-to-end, ensuring timely follow-up with the team and leadership until completion

- Actively monitor eCommerce-related questions or issues raised via Slack or
; create tasks/tickets as needed and drive them to resolution

- Maintain and monitor Airtable to ensure product upload statuses are accurate, deadlines are visible, and projects stay on schedule

- Oversee the product upload process across platforms, ensuring each product has complete and correct copy, imagery, and required assets before publishing

- Identify gaps proactively (missing copy, missing images, incomplete data, unclear approvals), coordinate ownership, and resolve blockers before launch dates are impacted

- Ensure accurate and timely image and copy uploads across all eCommerce platforms, including QA for formatting, spelling, links, and brand consistency

- Coordinate the copywriting workflow (draft ? review ? approval), ensuring product copy is completed and approved ahead of deadlines

- Coordinate promotions, banners, and on-site content updates, ensuring assets are briefed, created, approved, and ready in advance of launch

- Support the eCommerce team with miscellaneous operational and administrative tasks as needed, especially during heavy launch periods

- Work independently with a high level of productivity, efficiency, and attention to detail, escalating risks early and proposing solutions



Other Regular Responsibilities

- Utilize data and research to evaluate campaign performance, identifying key insights and providing actionable recommendations

- Maintain a well-organized and up-to-date repository of marketing assets (both internal as well as from competitors), such as graphics, promotional materials, and social media posts, ensuring easy access for the marketing team

- Assist the Marketing Director with various marketing-related tasks as needed



Who You Are

- 1–3 years of experience in eCommerce operations, digital operations, marketing operations, or a project coordination role (consumer products preferred)

- Highly organized with strong follow-through—you close loops and keep work moving

- Excellent attention to detail; you catch errors before they become customer-facing

- Strong written communication skills and comfort coordinating across multiple stakeholders

- Proficient with Airtable (or similar tools), Slack, and cloud-based docs; able to learn new platforms quickly

- Comfortable juggling multiple priorities and deadlines in a fast-paced environment

- Proactive, resourceful, and solutions-oriented; you don’t wait to be told what to do

- Alignment with the company's mission and values, which can be found here: 
/3Unr0ub.



About HiEnd Accents

HiEnd Accents designs and creates everyday luxury bedding and linens, sheeting, decorative pillows and other home textiles. Founded in 2005 and based in Dallas, Texas, our mission is to elevate our customers' lives via beautifully designed home textiles that deliver quality and value.



As a family-owned business, we’re committed to personal service and long-term relationships. Through our four brands, we offer unique designs across a spectrum of styles and price points, all united by exceptional value. Combined with our customer-first approach, prompt shipping and low order minimums, we’ve become the preferred bedding supplier for thousands of top department stores, furniture retailers, interior designers, and boutique hotels nationwide. Recently recognized on the 2024 INC 5000 list as one of the fastest-growing businesses in the US, we continue to innovate and expand our reach in the home textiles market.



Discover more about us and our brands at [
](
).



Want to get to know us better and learn what it’s like to be part of our growing team in the Philippines? Learn more here: 
/hea-ph-team



Why HiEnd Accents?

At HiEnd Accents, we're a close-knit team driven by entrepreneurial spirit, growth mindset, and a shared commitment to excellence. Our collaborative approach has propelled us to new heights – we're proud to be recognized on the 2024 INC 5000 list as one of the fastest-growing small companies in the United States. This achievement is a testament to our team's dedication and the exciting opportunities ahead. If you thrive in a vibrant, high-paced culture where your contributions truly matter, we want to hear from you!



Working at HiEnd Accents means that you can expect the following:



- **Competitive Compensation -** We offer a highly competitive compensation package, including 13th Month Pay

- **Professional Growth -** We invest in our people and make sure that they have the opportunity to continuously learn, grow and develop their careers

- **Great Team of Like-Minded Professionals -** We prioritize hiring based on culture and values, so you’re working with a team of folks who are as fun, talented, and committed as you are

title: night shift virtual assitant for customer service and logictic e-commerce
description:
Job offer: Night-time Virtual Assistant (Order Management & Logistics)



Hello everyone, I am currently recruiting Virtual Assistants for a key position as an e-commerce manager working remotely at night.



???? The position: You will be part of the logistics chain, from product purchase to final shipment to the customer in France. Answer customer questions and manage Vinted accounts. 



???? Training: Everything is explained step by step in a comprehensive video module (software, sourcing tips, inventory management). No logistics experience is required, but a high level of attention to detail is essential.



???? Salary: Salary of $200/month, 8 hours of work per day, 6 days a week (except Saturdays, which are days off), payment via Wise.



? Hours: 8 hours per day, 6 days a week (except Saturdays, which are days off).



?? Essential requirements:

You must have a fast computer and an excellent unlimited internet connection (fiber optic recommended).

You must be available for 8 hours a day without interruption and not have any other work at the same time.

Be extremely rigorous.

The hours are fixed and defined from 7 p.m. to 8 p.m., then a 1-hour break, then from 9 p.m. to 1 a.m., then a 1-hour break, and from 2 a.m. to 5 a.m. (these are Philippine time hours).



???? Your mission:

Administrative management: Track sales on the dashboard and update the accounts on Google Sheets.

Sourcing & Purchasing: Search for the best prices on Temu and Shein, use discount coupons, and manage supplier orders.

Logistics: Coordinate package arrivals with our warehouse in France using dedicated software.

Optimization: Recover price adjustment credits and manage inventory to avoid unnecessary purchases.

I am looking for serious, motivated, available, and resourceful people for the very long term.



???? Interested? Send me a short and compelling cover letter on Messenger. Please specify that you have read all the Essential requirements and have a good internet connection with 8 hours of free time at night.



Please Remember:

Do not ask when the results will be released. They will be announced after every application has been reviewed.

Do not use AI for your responses. Be genuine and creative, and write them independently. AI responses are prohibited

Provide detailed answers.

Read each question carefully

Sharing or explaining answers/ questions may result in your application being void or you may be blacklisted

title: Web Development Manager
description:
We are seeking an experienced Web Development Manager to oversee the planning, execution, and ongoing management of websites being built for our clients. This role is ideal for a hands-on leader who can manage multiple projects at once, ensure development standards are met, and keep web projects moving forward on time and on budget.



You will work closely with developers, designers, project managers, and stakeholders to ensure high-quality website builds and smooth collaboration across teams.



Key Responsibilities



- Manage and oversee all website development projects from kickoff through launch

- Ensure developers are completing assigned tasks accurately and on schedule

- Review code, site functionality, and overall build quality

- Maintain and enforce development standards, best practices, and workflows

- Coordinate with designers, SEO specialists, and project managers to align goals

- Troubleshoot technical issues and provide guidance to the development team

- Monitor project timelines, priorities, and workloads

- Conduct regular check-ins and progress updates with developers

- Ensure websites are optimized for performance, security, and scalability

- Assist with ongoing site maintenance, updates, and improvements post-launch



Required Qualifications

- 3–5+ years of professional web development experience

- 1–2+ years of experience leading or managing developers

- Strong knowledge of HTML, CSS, JavaScript, and modern frameworks

- Experience with CMS platforms (WordPress preferred)

- Understanding of responsive design and cross-browser compatibility

- Familiarity with Git/version control

- Ability to review and provide feedback on code

- Strong organizational and time management skills

- Excellent communication and leadership abilities



Preferred Qualifications:



- Experience working in a digital marketing or web agency

- Knowledge of SEO best practices and site performance optimization

- Familiarity with hosting environments, DNS, and deployment processes

- Experience managing multiple client projects simultaneously

title: Sales Development Representative (SDR)
description:
Snap Dental Labs 

Remote 

Base Salary: $800/month 

On-Target Earnings: $2,000-$3,000/month 

Compensation: Base + Commission Per Closed Account 



About Snap Dental Labs 

Snap Dental Labs is a rapidly growing, full-service digital dental laboratory serving clinics across 

the United States. We provide high-quality restorative solutions with fast turnaround times and 

competitive pricing. 



We are scaling aggressively and building a strong sales team to support our growth. 



The Opportunity 

We are hiring a Sales Development Representative to convert interested dental clinics into 

active accounts. 



You will be working primarily with warm inbound leads generated from paid advertising,
 

campaigns, and ongoing marketing efforts. These clinics already have interest - your job is to 

build trust and move them forward. 



This is not random cold calling all day. 



This is structured follow-up and relationship building. 



Responsibilities 

• Follow up with inbound and outbound clinic leads 

• Build relationships with doctors and office managers 

• Educate prospects on our services 

• Overcome objections 

• Convert clinics into active accounts 

• Maintain organized CRM notes 

• Hit monthly close targets 



Compensation 

• $800/month guaranteed base 

• Commission paid per closed account 

• On-target earnings of $2,000-$3,000/month 

• Performance-based upside 



If you are consistent and organized, you will earn well above base. 



Ideal Candidate 

• Comfortable on the phone 

• Strong follow-up skills 

• Clear communicator 

• Competitive and goal-driven 

• Sales experience preferred 



Dental experience is a plus but not required. 



If you are looking for stable base pay with real upside and warm leads provided, apply with your 

resume and a short message explaining why you’d be a strong fit.

title: PMHOA Pro Is Hiring a High-Performance Closer (Full Cycle – Call - Meet - Close)
description:
****PLEASE READ CAREFULLY!! THOSE WHO APPLY THROUGH OLJ, WE WILL NOT SHORTLIST. PLEASE APPLY ON THE LINK BELOW THIS JD******



PMHOA Pro Is Hiring a High-Performance Closer (Full Cycle – Call - Meet - Close)

Remote • Full-Time Contractor • Competitive Compensation + Growth



APPLY HERE: 





PMHOA Pro is the leading outsourced business development partner helping home service providers (roofers, remediation, HVAC, cleaning, plumbing, landscaping, etc.) win relationships with Property Managers and HOAs across the U.S.



We are expanding our elite sales team and looking for a full-cycle Closer who can call inbound/warm opportunities, meet with them on Zoom, and close deals confidently.



If you thrive in a fast-moving sales environment and have the numbers to back up your performance, we want to talk.





What You’ll Be Doing



You will own the full sales cycle:



Calling qualified prospects already in our CRM or sourcing your own leads

Running booked and self-scheduled meetings via Zoom (as needed)

Conducting structured discovery conversations

Presenting services, pricing, and territory options

Handling objections with confidence

Negotiating and finalizing agreements

Handing off closed deals to onboarding and fulfillment



Additional responsibilities include:



Managing and updating pipeline stages in HubSpot

Calling unworked and follow-up leads in the queue

Collaborating with Setters and Researchers to increase show-up rates

Reporting weekly numbers and deal progress







Role Requirements (Non-Negotiable)



Proven experience closing warm B2B leads

Strong phone presence and comfort calling prospects directly

Excellent discovery skills and active listening

Ability to control the call without sounding pushy

Confidence running full discovery ? offer ? objection ? close

Organized, reliable, and process-driven with strong CRM discipline

Data-focused mindset (show-up rate, close rate, revenue tracked)

Ability to commit to consistent weekly availability



This is not cold calling strangers. Every contact is warm, pre-educated, and entered by Setters, Webinars, or our Research team.





Bonus Points (We Can Train These)



Experience selling to home service companies

HubSpot or similar CRM familiarity

Prior remote sales or BDR roles

Understanding of property management relationships



You don’t need to know our industry — but you must already know how to close.







Must Submit to Be Considered



We don’t accept guesses — only performance. Please provide:



Past 6–12 months closing metrics, including:

Show-up rate

Close rate

Average deal size

Total revenue closed

Industry sold into

3–5 recorded closing calls (highly preferred)

Short Loom or video introduction

Brief outline of your closing method or call flow





What You Get



High volume of warm, qualified opportunities

Proven scripts, call flows, and presentation frameworks

Continuous training, coaching, and leadership development

Fast-moving team with significant growth potential

Flexible remote work with performance-based earnings



Do Not Apply If You Are



Trying to “get into closing” without a track record

Easily discouraged or unwilling to make outbound calls

Avoidant of CRM usage or data updates

Dependent on high-pressure sales tactics

Uncomfortable being measured on performance









PAY RATE:





Pay: PHP70,000/month + commission

Commission: Paid per signed contract

Earning Potential: High-performers hit PHP100,000–PHP200,000+ per month

Commission is uncapped — show us you can close and you’ll write your own paycheck.





How to Apply



Send the following:



Résumé

Verified sales statistics

Loom or video introduction

Call recordings (if available)



Subject line: PMHOA Pro Closer – [Your Name]





APPLY HERE:

title: Urgent Recruiter – Cold Calling Setup
description:
Job Title: Recruiter – Cold Calling Setup

Location: Remote

Employment Type: Full-Time

Job Overview:

We are seeking a highly motivated and goal-driven Recruiter with a strong background in cold calling to join our growing recruitment team. The ideal candidate will be comfortable initiating conversations with potential candidates via phone, qualifying leads, and effectively communicating job opportunities. This role plays a crucial part in building a strong candidate pipeline and ensuring a seamless recruitment process.

________________________________________

Key Responsibilities:

• Proactively source candidates through cold calling, online job platforms, databases, and other recruitment channels.

• Conduct initial phone screenings to assess candidates' qualifications, interest level, and availability.

• Educate and inform candidates about job opportunities, company culture, and next steps in the hiring process.

• Maintain accurate records and candidate information using recruitment platforms (e.g., Ricochet, ATS).

• Coordinate and schedule interviews in alignment with hiring managers' availability.

• Follow up with no-show candidates and reschedule when necessary.

• Collaborate with the recruitment and training teams to ensure seamless onboarding.

• Provide regular reports and updates on candidate pipelines and recruitment activity.

• Mange client’s Indeed and set appointment using Calendly

________________________________________

Qualifications:

• Proven experience in recruitment, telesales, or outbound calling is preferred.

• Excellent communication and interpersonal skills.

• Comfortable making a high volume of outbound calls daily.

• Strong organizational and time-management abilities.

• Familiarity with applicant tracking systems (ATS) or CRM tools is a plus.

• Ability to work independently and as part of a remote team.

• High level of integrity and professionalism.

________________________________________

What We Offer:

• Competitive compensation and performance-based incentives

• Full Remote Set-up

• Opportunities for career growth and development

• Supportive and collaborative team environment

• Training and resources to support your success

title: AI Image / Prompting Specialist (Nano Bana Pro) – Join a Next-Generation AI Agency
description:
We are not looking for a regular prompt writer.

We are looking for an AI Image / Prompting Specialist who creates visuals so realistic that nobody can tell they were generated by AI.



We are a fast-growing agency based in Germany with a clear mission:

- To become one of the top players worldwide in AI image generation (and soon AI video production).



To achieve this, we are building a small but elite team of specialists who value quality above everything else.



If you love perfection, notice details others miss, and take pride in delivering premium-level visual results — keep reading.



-> Your Mission



Your goal is to create 100% photorealistic AI images that match — or even exceed — real product photography.



Your work will be used for:

• High-end product visualizations

• Marketing & advertising creatives

• E-commerce visuals

• Agency-level campaign imagery



-> Our quality standards are extremely high.



Example of the expected level:





This level — or better — is what we aim for.



-> Your Responsibilities



• Creating precise prompts using Nano Bana Pro

• Generating ultra-realistic AI images

• Ensuring 100% product accuracy (shape, materials, lighting, details)

• Iterating and refining prompts until perfection is achieved

• Photoshop post-processing and final image refinement

• Developing repeatable prompting workflows

• Continuously improving visual quality standards



-> Requirements



You are a great fit if you:



- Have experience with Nano Bana Pro prompting

- Have a strong eye for detail

- Can create photorealistic images indistinguishable from real photography

- Can maintain perfect product accuracy in generated images

- Are experienced in Photoshop for retouching and finishing

- Have a strong aesthetic sense

- Are reliable and respect deadlines

- Maintain extremely high quality standards for your own work



->  Bonus:



• Experience working with multiple AI image models or pipelines

• Background in photography, lighting, or product visualization



-> What You Can Expect



• Long-term collaboration (not a short-term gig)

• Work on premium, real-world projects

• Growth in one of the fastest-evolving industries

• Direct collaboration with an ambitious core team

• Opportunity to help shape workflows and creative standards

• Work at the forefront of AI creative production



We are not building a mass-production studio.

We are building a high-performance creative lab.



-> Important



We are not looking for someone who simply writes prompts — we are looking for someone who chases visual perfection.



If you are the kind of person who does 20 more iterations because a shadow isn’t perfect yet, you might be exactly who we are looking for.



-> How to Apply



Please include:



• Examples of your best AI image work (portfolio or links)

• A short description of your experience with Nano Bana Pro

• The tools and workflows you currently use

• Why you want to work long-term in the AI creative industry



We are excited to work with people who are as driven by quality and innovation as we are.

title: Figma UI/UX Designer
description:
Who We Are:

 - We are a focused product team building and evolving a suite of internal and customer-facing applications, including web admin tools, signage systems, and smart TV applications. Our work includes both new product development and ongoing improvements to existing production tools.

 - This is a part-time contract role starting at approximately 10 hours per week. Workload will vary based on active projects, and we want someone comfortable with that flexibility. If the relationship works well and work expands, there is potential for the role to grow over time.



The Role:

 - We are looking for a UI/UX Designer with strong Figma expertise who can take product requirements and translate them into clean, developer-ready designs — fast. This is a design execution role, not a brand strategy role. You will work within an existing design framework and system, producing screens, flows, and components that developers can build directly from.

 - Primary focus will be on Conqrse and AEO projects. You will take PRDs and convert them into usable UI so developers are never in the position of making layout decisions themselves.

 - This role is a part-time contract position with hours that will flex based on active project needs.



Key Responsibilities:

 - Translate PRDs and wireframes into polished, developer-ready Figma files.

 - Work within the existing design system — extending it, not reinventing it.

 - Produce screens, flows, and component specs across desktop, tablet, and mobile as needed.

 - Build and maintain reusable components, variants, and patterns within Figma.

 - Document component states, usage guidelines, and design decisions clearly for engineers.

 - Iterate quickly on feedback from the PM and team leads.

 - Collaborate async with developers and PM using modern, AI-assisted workflows (Antigravity, MCP, etc.).

 - Participate in brief check-ins with overlap during U.S. hours.





What You Bring:

 - Strong Figma expertise — components, variants, auto-layout, styles, and tokens.

 - Experience building and maintaining reusable design systems for long-running products.

 - Ability to break down complex apps into consistent layouts, components, and patterns.

 - Good visual design sense: hierarchy, spacing, typography, color, and contrast.

 - Comfortable working from existing templates and systems rather than starting from scratch.

 - Understands responsive design and can design for desktop, tablet, and phone.



Collaboration:

 - Comfortable working async with developers and PM, iterating quickly on feedback.

 - Able to document components, states, and usage clearly for engineers.

 - Comfortable collaborating with AI-assisted workflows and tools.

 - Good English communication skills.





Why Join Us:

 - Part-time contract starting at ~10 hours per week — flexible and project-driven.

 - Potential for the role to grow as projects and workload expand.

 - Ownership of real product screens used in live applications.

 - Small, supportive team where your work has direct impact.

 - Modern workflow using AI tools and current best practices.



Design Test:

All applicants will be given a short design test (~1 hour) as part of the hiring process. You will be provided with existing design elements and asked to build components and two views within Figma. This is not a test of creativity or brand vision — it is a test of your ability to work accurately and efficiently within an existing system.



Portfolio Requirement:

Please include at least one example of a robust design system or multi-page web app built in Figma. We want to see how you organize files, structure components, and hand them off to developers.

title: Pricing & Operations Executive
description:
Before applying, please make sure you can answer Yes to the following questions, otherwise you will not be considered



Do you have Amazon FBA Experience? this is mandatory and will be asked in the interview phase.

Do you have Pricing Experience? this is mandatory and will be asked in the interview phase.

Do you have Operations and Logistics Experience Ocean freight and Air? this is mandatory and will be asked in the interview phase



Job Summary:

The Pricing & Operations Executive will oversee comprehensive pricing and operational processes for international logistics (Europe, UK, India, Taiwan, Japan, etc. regions), with a specific focus on Amazon deliveries. This includes sourcing and negotiating competitive quotes, handling end-to-end coordination, tracking, documentation, cross-team collaboration and ensuring compliance with Amazon's delivery standards. The role requires excellent organizational skills, attention to detail, and proactive communication with logistics partners, USA Pricing and USA Sales team.

Key Responsibilities:

1. Comprehensive Quote Management

o For each sales inquiry, obtain detailed and competitive quotes from at least three agents, covering both origin and destination countries.

o Ensure quotes include a complete breakdown of warehousing, shipping, and customs costs, providing sales teams with a comprehensive pricing package.

2. Pricing Negotiation with Agents

o Negotiate rates with overseas agents to secure competitive and sustainable pricing.

o Maintain strong relationships with logistics partners and agents worldwide.

o Compare pricing options based on cost, transit time, and service level and recommend the best option internally.

3. Quote Comparison and Presentation

o Compare quotes for each inquiry, evaluating cost, service quality, and transit times.

o Present the best pricing options to the sales team, emphasizing competitive rates and strategic advantages.

4. End-to-End Operations Coordination

o Coordinate the entire logistics operation from pickup at origin to final delivery at destination.

o Arrange warehousing and transportation with selected agents, ensuring compliance with customer schedules.

o Prepare and submit all necessary customs and compliance documents on time to prevent delays.

o Monitor shipment status with logistics partners and keep sales teams informed of any updates or changes.

o Respond to customer inquiries related to shipment status when required.

5. Amazon Delivery Compliance

o Schedule and confirm Amazon delivery appointments, ensuring on-time booking per Amazon’s requirements.

o Verify that shipments meet Amazon’s standards for palletization, packaging, and labeling; coordinate re-palletizing or adjustments if needed, in collaboration with destination agents.

o Share additional handling costs and operational updates with sales and customers.

o Ensure goods are properly prepared and tracked until final delivery to Amazon, providing updates to customers and sales teams as necessary.

6. Offer Creation, Tracking & Reporting

o Create and maintain shipment offers and pricing records.

o Maintain on-hand inventory and shipment status reports

o Ensure shipment data is accurate and up to date across internal systems.

o Create shipment insurance when required.

o Upload insurance documents and related files to the internal portal.

o Ensure all shipment documentation is properly updated and stored.

7. Finance & Vendor Documentation

o Upload vendor payment details to the finance shared drive.

o Upload and maintain supplier invoices accurately.

o Support finance and operations teams with pricing and payment documentation when needed.

8. Weekly pricing excel update for Freightos

o Collect FCL prices from Other than China Asia routes such as Korea, Vietnam, Japan, Taiwan, India weekly to provide prices to Freightos platform.

o Try to find reasonable prices to convert customers from other platform.







Qualifications:

• Schools: Graduated from Business Administration, Economy, Industrial Engineering or International trade

• Experience: 5-8 years of experience in international logistics pricing & operations

• Skills: Excellent negotiation, communication, and organizational skills with a keen eye for detail.

• Technical Proficiency: Knowledge of logistics management and compliance documentation.

• Language: Fluent in English

title: AI Video Prompter/ Editor
description:
We are seeking a reliable AI Video Assistant to assist in generating and lightly editing videos using simple, browser-based AI tools. This is a LONG-TERM COOPERATION.



All prompts, workflows, and instructions will be provided — no prompt creation, technical background, or advanced editing skills are required. This role focuses on execution, accuracy, and attention to detail.



Responsibilities:



- Execute provided prompts and instructions using AI video tools (e.g., Veo – free version)

- Perform basic video edits such as trimming, arranging clips, and adding simple text or captions

- Add your IQ level on the subject line upon submission of this application

- Review AI-generated content and apply simple revisions based on feedback

- Follow content guidelines and meet daily output expectations



Tools Used:



- Browser-based AI video tools

- Simple video editors similar to Microsoft Clipchamp

(No professional editing software required)



Work Schedule



- 8–10 hours per day, 7 days a week

- Full-time, remote

- Consistent availability during agreed working hours



Technical Requirements



Internet Connection:



- Minimum 100 Mbps stable internet connection (wired preferred)

- PC / Laptop Specifications (Minimum):

- Processor: Intel i5 (10th gen or higher) or AMD Ryzen 5 equivalent

- RAM: 16 GB RAM

- Storage: SSD with at least 256 GB free space

- OS: Windows 10/11 (64-bit) or macOS equivalent

- Browser: Latest version of Chrome or Edge



Requirements:



- Ability to follow step-by-step instructions

- Strong attention to detail

- Willingness to learn and accept feedback

- Reliable internet and suitable workstation



In your cover letter only include THESE items:



- PC Specs

- Agree to working 8–10 hours per day, 7 days a week

- Expected monthly salary (not hourly)

- 
 username



Applications that do not read and follow instructions will be ignored.

title: Senior US Bookkeeper – 5+ Years US GAAP – Remote
description:
Long-Term US-Facing Role. Hands-On Ownership. Real SME Impact.

MAVI partners with US-based SMEs and growing businesses, embedding experienced accounting and bookkeeping professionals directly into their finance operations.



In the Philippines, we focus on building long-term partnerships — where senior bookkeepers take real ownership inside lean, hands-on US environments.



This is not transactional data entry.

You will work closely with US founders, Controllers, or finance leads in dynamic SME settings.



The Opportunity

We are hiring a Senior US Bookkeeper to manage day-to-day accounting operations and support month-end close under US GAAP for US SME clients.

You will operate in lean teams where accountability, clarity, and ownership matter more than hierarchy.

This role is ideal for professionals who want:

Stable long-term US client engagement

Broader ownership beyond narrow task execution

Direct collaboration with decision-makers

Meaningful contribution to growing businesses



What You Will Own

- Manage day-to-day bookkeeping under US GAAP

- Record and review journal entries

- Perform bank and balance sheet reconciliations

- Maintain accurate general ledger records

- Support month-end close and reporting preparation

 - Assist with accounts payable and receivable oversight

- Collaborate directly with US stakeholders

- Help improve bookkeeping workflows and documentation



What We’re Looking For

- 5+ years of US bookkeeping / accounting experience

- Strong understanding of US GAAP fundamentals

- Experience supporting US-based clients

- Proficiency in QuickBooks (NetSuite a plus)

- Independent ownership mindset

- Comfort operating in lean SME environments

- Strong English communication skills



Why Join MAVI?

- Long-term US partnerships

- Direct exposure to US business owners and finance leaders

- Hands-on ownership in SME finance teams

- Clear responsibilities and stable engagement

- Opportunity to grow steadily within a global finance network

title: US Accounting Manager
description:
Long-Term US Engagement. Lead the Close in Lean SME Environments.

MAVI partners with US-based SMEs and growing businesses, embedding experienced accounting professionals directly into their finance operations.



The Opportunity

This role is ideal for senior professionals who want:

- Stable, long-term US client engagement

- Broader technical ownership

- Direct collaboration with decision-makers

- Meaningful impact in growing businesses



What You’ll Do

- Lead end-to-end accounting (AP, AR, GL, reconciliations, month-end close, and reporting) for US clients

- Prepare, review, and finalize financial statements under US GAAP

- Manage and mentor a small team of accountants to ensure delivery excellence

- Partner directly with client finance leaders to provide insights and process improvements

- Drive accuracy, compliance, and efficiency across every accounting touchpoint

- Leverage modern tools like QuickBooks, NetSuite, or Xero to streamline workflows

- Collaborate cross-functionally with FP&A, Tax, and Operations for a complete finance picture



What You’ll Bring

- 5–8 years of total experience, with strong exposure to US accounting and reporting standards

- Proven expertise in end-to-end accounting, reconciliations, and financial statements

- Deep knowledge of US GAAP and the ability to close books independently

- Experience in outsourced accounting, shared services, or client-facing environments

- Hands-on experience with tools like QuickBooks, NetSuite, 
, or Xero

- Excellent communication, stakeholder management, and leadership skills

- A proactive, ownership-driven mindset-you take pride in precision and partnership



Why Join MAVI

High-Impact Work: Directly support US CFOs, founders, and finance leaders.

Premium Compensation: Competitive pay that recognizes your global contribution.

Global Exposure: Collaborate with venture-backed startups and high-growth companies.

Growth Acceleration: Continuous learning, leadership opportunities, and network visibility.

Elite Community: Join a vetted network of top finance professionals shaping the future of work.

title: Administrative assistant
description:
PermitFlow’s mission is to streamline and simplify construction permitting in the $1.6 trillion United States construction market. Our software reduces time to permit, supporting permitting end-to-end including permit research, application preparation, submission, and monitoring.



We’ve raised a $31m Series A led by Kleiner Perkins with participation from Initialized Capital, Y Combinator, Felicis Ventures, Altos Ventures, and the founders and executives from Zillow, PlanGrid, Thumbtack, Bluebeam, Uber, Procore, and more.



Our team is remote first and consists of architects, structural engineers, permitting experts, and workflow software specialists, all who have personally experienced the pain of permitting.



What You’ll Do:

Experienced Administrative Assistant



Experience managing teams



Strong communicator with excellent organizational skills and a flexible / self-motivated approach to business management



Communicate with 3rd parties through phone and



Support the company’s work to facilitate accelerating development and long-term success



What You Need:

A fast and reliable internet connection is required. Back up connection is recommended.



Laptop or Desktop with no less than 8 GB RAM, minimum of Intel Core i5 processor or equivalent.



A quality video camera is recommended for Zoo
etings



Noise cancelling microphone



Qualifications & Fit:

Proven experience in a similar role



Excellent organizational abilities



Outstanding communication and people skills



Good attention to detail



Computer literate; Familiarity with MS Office and common computer programs





Check out this page (
) to listen to what some of our international members have to say about working at PermitFlow!



You can submit your application at the following link:

title: Job Title: Shopify / Hydrogen React Developer (Headless + Custom Apps + UI/UX)
description:
Experience Level: Mid–Senior

Compensation: Based on experience



Job Description:

We are hiring a highly technical developer to support and expand our headless ecommerce environment. You will work on a Shopify-based stack using Hydrogen (React), headless builds, and custom app development. This role requires strong API and coding experience plus solid UI/UX understanding to help deliver high-performance, user-friendly storefront experiences.



Must Have Skills:



Strong hands-on Shopify development experience



Proven Hydrogen + React experience



Headless commerce build experience



Experience building custom Shopify apps



Strong API integration experience (REST and GraphQL)



Solid coding and software engineering fundamentals



Real production coding experience (not theme-only work)



UI/UX experience for ecommerce storefronts and flows



Technical Requirements:



Advanced JavaScript / React skills



API design and integration experience



Experience with webhooks and authentication flows



Experience translating UI/UX designs into production code



Responsive design and performance best practices



Version control (Git) and modern dev workflows



Nice to Have:



Backend or database experience



Ecommerce conversion optimization experience



Experience collaborating with design teams



Responsibilities:



Build and maintain headless storefront features



Develop custom Shopify apps and integrations



Implement API connections and third-party services



Translate UI/UX designs into fast, clean interfaces



Optimize performance and user experience



Write scalable, well-documented code



To Apply:

Send your resume, portfolio, GitHub, and links to relevant Shopify, headless, custom app, and UI/UX projects. Include examples of API work and shipped production builds.



If you want, I can also compress this into a shorter, punchier PH job board version.

title: AI / Image Editor (Remote – Philippines)
description:
AI / Image Editor (Remote – Philippines)

About Poly & Bark



Poly & Bark is a direct-to-consumer modern furniture brand. We rely heavily on strong visuals to sell—product imagery, lifestyle scenes,
 marketing, promotions, and digital gift cards.



We’re expanding our use of AI-generated imagery to create high-quality furniture visuals faster and at scale, and we’re hiring a high-level AI/Image Editor to help us do it right.



What You’ll Do



Create realistic AI-generated lifestyle scenes featuring furniture



Edit, retouch, upscale, and polish AI images to production-quality standards



Design marketing visuals for
 campaigns, promotions, and digital gift cards



Support website imagery, launches, and seasonal campaigns



Maintain a clean, modern, on-brand aesthetic



Work remotely with our marketing and design team



What We’re Looking For



3–6 years of graphic design or image editing experience

title: MAINTENANCE CO-ORDINATOR
description:
MAINTENANCE CO-ORDINATOR



Do you love getting chaos under control? Are you detailed and high level but get things done easily? Are you hands on, and does maintenance make clear sense to you to the point where you can co-ordinate others?



If so, this role is for you!!!



We are searching for an experienced Maintenance Co-ordinator for our short term business in the UK. We run Airbnb properties, where people pay to stay for 2 or 3 nights, much like a hotel.



We have over 60 properties across various different towns and cities in the UK, so keeping our properties in tip top condition is a real challenge.



The role is hands-on, its high-responsibility, its intense, and its hard. Please do not apply if you are not prepared to work hard and fast, whilst remaining at a detail level that is second to none.



Picture this, you're sitting at your desk, updating and managing our Operations Dashboard, digging deeper into reported issues, making calls to Maintenance /Trades that you've built relationships with, and getting them to arrive on site and resolve, all whilst we have guests checking in within a matter of hours. The pressure is on!



You’ll be the glue between our guests, our team, and our properties — ensuring that properties are always well maintained.



You’ll lead, coordinate, and continuously improve our operations and processes.



Job Specifics:



- Remote Maintenance Co-Ordinator (Full-Time, UK Hours) – PureStay

- Location: Remote (Philippines-based)

- Hours: UK time | 8:30 AM – 5:30 PM GMT | Monday to Friday

- Salary: 65,000/month (depending on experience)

- 6 Month Probation Period

- Employment Type: Full-time (exclusive to PureStay – no side clients)

- Start Date: within the next 6 weeks

- Experience: Must have very relevant experience (no new starters)

- Apply via OnlineJobs.ph with subject: Maintenance Co-ordinator



Key Responsibilities:



- Co-ordinate daily Maintenance across our property portfolio.

- Utilising great comms via
, phone call, WhatsApp to deliver clarity on issues

- Populate and manage the maintenance tracker with new, and manage existing entries

- Speaking to UK Trades daily and building strong relationships

- Issue documents such as terms and conditions to trades etc.

- Solve problems fast, but always think long-term

- Be able to handle financial conversations, quotes, updates on payments etc.

- Provide regular updates, spot trends, and proactively suggest improvements



Must-Have Skills:

- Incredible attention to detail and strong organisational habits

- Clear written and spoken English (UK client communication is daily)

- Great phone confidence

- Calm, logical, and excellent problem-solving under pressure

- Tech confident (Google Sheets, CRMs, task managers like Trello, Slack, Hubspot etc.)

- 3 years + experience in this industry dealing with operations and maintenance

- Understands Serviced Accommodation and Airbnb model



Who We Are

PureStay is one of the UK’s leading short-stay property management companies. We manage over 60+ properties nationwide, with a growing team spread across the UK and abroad.



We're re-building our remote team and looking for dedicated, smart, detail-obsessed professionals who want long-term roles where they can grow.







How to Apply:

Apply directly on OnlineJobs.ph with the subject line: MAINTENANCE CO-ORDINATOR-2026



To Apply, Please include:



A short cover letter and intro video (1–3 mins)

Your updated CV

Examples of previous operations work (bonus if in property/hospitality/logistics)

Your favourite productivity tool and why



Join a company where you’re trusted, empowered, and never just a cog in the machine.



Good Luck!

title: Finance & Billing Operations Manager
description:
Finance & Billing Operations Manager



Remote (Philippines-Based) | Full-Time | Long-Term Role



About Us



We are a fast-growing U.S.-based healthcare and real estate portfolio operating multiple companies nationwide. Our businesses are expanding rapidly, and we are building a strong finance operations team to support billing, payroll, and financial management across multiple entities.



This is a long-term, high-trust role with significant growth potential for the right candidate.



We are looking for someone who wants stability, responsibility, and career advancement — not just a short-term freelance project.



Position Overview



We are seeking a highly organized, detail-oriented, and experienced Finance & Billing Operations Manager based in the Philippines to oversee billing operations and support financial management across multiple U.S.-based companies.



This role will begin with managing billing operations for a healthcare services company and will expand into payroll processing (1099 contractors and W-2 employees), bill pay management, reconciliations, and financial reporting support across multiple companies in our portfolio.



The ideal candidate has excellent English communication skills, strong accounting fundamentals, and prior experience working with U.S.-based businesses.



This is a long-term career opportunity with room to grow into a leadership role within our finance team.



Core Responsibilities (Immediate Focus)



• Manage and respond to client billing inquiries professionally and promptly

• Assist clients with updating payment methods and resolving billing issues

• Monitor accounts receivable and track outstanding balances

• Maintain accurate and organized billing records across systems

• Calculate monthly doctor payouts and prepare reports for CFO review

• Assist with coordinating monthly direct deposit payments

• Reconcile billing discrepancies and resolve payment issues

• Generate financial and billing reports as needed



Expanded Responsibilities (Growth Scope)



• Process payroll for U.S.-based 1099 contractors and W-2 employees

• Manage bill payments across multiple companies

• Assist with cash flow tracking and reporting

• Support monthly financial reporting and reconciliations

• Coordinate with U.S.-based CPAs and accountants

• Help maintain financial controls across multiple business entities

• Assist in building organized financial systems and documentation processes



Required Qualifications



• 3+ years of experience in accounting, bookkeeping, or finance operations

• Experience working with U.S.-based companies (strongly preferred)

• Excellent written and spoken English (client-facing communication required)

• Strong understanding of billing systems and accounts receivable processes

• Advanced proficiency in Excel or Google Sheets

• Experience handling confidential financial information

• Highly organized and detail-oriented

• Reliable internet connection and quiet work environment

• Stable work history (we are looking for long-term commitment)



Highly Preferred Qualifications



• Accounting degree (CPA or CPA-track is a major plus)

• Experience with QuickBooks Online or similar accounting software

• Experience processing U.S. payroll (Gusto, ADP, or similar systems)

• Experience supporting a CFO or executive team

• Experience managing finances across multiple companies

• Healthcare billing experience



Personal Traits We Value



• High integrity and trustworthy

• Extremely detail-oriented

• Process-driven and organized

• Calm under pressure

• Proactive problem solver

• Long-term mindset



Compensation



• Competitive salary based on experience

• Full-time position

• Long-term role with growth potential

• Opportunity to grow into Finance Lead for multiple U.S. companies



To Apply



Please include the following in your application:



A short introduction about yourself



Your experience working with U.S. companies



Accounting software and payroll systems you have used



Confirmation of your internet speed



Why you are looking for a long-term role



Applications that do not include the above information may not be reviewed.

title: Content Creator (TikTok, Instagram) with sense of humor and interest in Personal Development
description:
I am looking for someone ON FIRE about personal development, who would like to use my App for his/her day-to-day personal development and share the journey online, through all ups and downs :)



That's it.



Your win: Well, the salary, of course.

Your other win: You'll improve in the areas you would like to improve in, personally - 100% guaranteed.

Your other win: You'll learn how to build a personal, authentic brand online. That you may later use for your own business? I'm very happy to help with any experiment of your own.

My win: You become an authentic face of the brand :) Super valuable for growing a community.



THE APP (iPhone only)

I realized that almost everyone would like to grow as a person, but no one REALLY knows how and where to start.

Having lots of experience in this area, I've built the first proper SYSTEM for personal development - so that literally anyone can start easily and doesn't need to buy an expensive Coach.

-> "Identity - Your Growth System" in the App Store, just check it out, it's free. Early user feedback (250 users) has been insane! 



The App structures this whole journey, gives lots of guidance and makes tracking super intuitive.



YOUR CONCRETE DELIVERABLES

1 Reel per Day. 

We iterate between low-effort reels, medium-effort, and high-effort.

Low-Effort: Static shot, with single-statement on the screen

Medium-Effort: Talking to the camera, sharing some learning/insight/struggle/tips

High-Effort: "Day in the Life" type Reel

-> I built a content engine that spits out a lot of ideas/messages, for the days where you don't have something natural to share



WAYS OF WORKING

No micro-managing at all. We discuss the goals I have for the channel, and you have full creative freedom. I'm always available to assist with sparring ideas or removing blockers. We do a (paid) weekly feedback call, to discuss what is going good and what can be improved from both sides.



WHAT I'M HOPING FOR

The only thing important for me is that you are an outgoing personality, and that you are really passionate about personal growth. Not necessarily that you're already an expert, but that you would LOVE to become one.

Some examples:

- reaching fitness goals (gym, calisthenics, pilates, yoga, core workouts, running, ..)

- happiness and mindfulness (meditation, breathing, journaling, reducing doomscrolling, ..)

- getting a better rhythm (sleeping times, waking times, evening routine, morning routine, ..)

- better social life (meeting friends for coffee, organizing a dinner, calling friends/family, ..)

- learning/curiosity (reading, podcasts, ..)

- creativity (writing, painting, making music, ..)

- purpose (side hustle, volunteering, ..)



IF YOU HAVE READ UNTIL HERE

You're most likely a good candidate, otherwise you wouldn't have remained interested ;)

Begin your application with "LETS HAVE SOME FUN", then a small text (2-5 sentences) explaining why you would love to get this job, and what makes you a good fit. End with "I have an iPhone" (you must be an iPhone user, because the App is iPhone-only).

Feel free to attach any supporting material if you want.



KICKOFF

Two paid trial weeks, for both of us to see whether it's a good fit :)

title: SHORT-FORM VIDEO EDITOR
description:
ABOUT THE ROLE

We’re looking for a Short-Form Content Editor to support a U.S.-based business and entrepreneurship content brand focused on business funding, credit education, financial strategy, and entrepreneurship through educational talking-head and podcast-style content.



This role is focused on owning short-form editing execution—turning raw and long-form footage into high-quality, high-retention clips.



This is an editing-only role. No posting. No scheduling.



JOB DESCRIPTION

Edit short-form videos for Instagram Reels, TikTok, YouTube Shorts,
, and LinkedIn

Repurpose content from long-form podcasts, talking-head educational videos, and in-person events

Deliver 60–80 short-form clips per month with an average length of 60–90 seconds

Deliver clips in organized batches and maintain a content buffer to stay ahead of posting



JOB REQUIREMENTS

Strong understanding of short-form pacing, retention, and clean editing styles

Ability to identify strong 
nts from long-form content beyond basic cutting

Experience using professional desktop editing software such as Adobe Premiere Pro, Final Cut Pro, or DaVinci Resolve

Ability to deliver organized project files and reusable templates

We are looking for editing instincts and pacing similar to: Alex Hormozi, Karlton Dennis & Dan Martell

Full-time availability (40 hours per week) with U.S. business hours or strong U.S. daytime overlap



COMPENSATION

$1,000–$1,500 USD per month, depending on experience and execution level



IMPORTANT: To apply, please complete our application form using the link below. Only candidates who successfully submit the application will be considered.
